Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 7:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Periods of rain beginning early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h this evening except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
